Title: UnifiedASP Web Controls
Description: This control pack includes an extended ASP.Net 2.0 GridView with simplified support for sorting and paging, and an extended TextBox control with built-in and more-easily configured validators. It was built as part of the open-source framework UnifiedASP.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This control pack includes an extended ASP.Net 2.0 GridView with simplified support for sorting and paging, and an extended TextBox control with built-in and more-easily configured validators. It was built as part of the open-source framework UnifiedASP.

Resources
This control pack is one component of our larger UnifiedASP framework and Code Generation tools. For video tutorials, examples of use, and documentation, visit our companion site at http://www.unifiedasp.net/index.php/unifiedasp-control-primer/.

Planning
  • We're soft-launching this to colleagues to get their feedback. We would welcome your feedback as well on any issues you find.
  • This first release is in VB.Net
  • A C# version will be released in April or May '09.
